data.title: 29 illegal migrants found crammed inside pickup box
data.description: PATTANI - Twenty-nine  illegal migrants  from  Myanmar  were found crammed inside an enclosed box in the bed of a pickup truck at a road checkpoint in Sai Buri district of this southern province on Saturday.

data.title: Analysis cites potential impact of Trump presidency on Thai economy
data.description: Economic and Business Forecasting Centre outlines both direct and indirect repercussions for Thailand

data.title: Financial phishing plagues SEA firms; Thailand hit hardest with 140K+ attacks
data.description: From January to June 2024, Kaspersky anti-phishing technologies detected 336,294 phishing attacks launched at organisations and businesses in Southeast Asia.

data.title: Israel-Thailand partnership aims to shape the future of food
data.description: FoodTech Roadshow in Bangkok showcases latest advancements in food technology

data.title: Buddhist monastery ‘using human bodies for meditation’
data.description: Forty-one  cadavers  used in meditation practices at a Buddhist  monastery  in Phichit province are being identified in a police investigation to determine whether they were obtained and used legally.

data.title: Thailand and Malaysia to deepen tourism ties
data.description: Thai Ministry of Foreign Affairs dispatches advisers to Malaysia to discuss how to enhance tourism cooperation

data.title: Singaporean man nabbed for allegedly faking bomb threat at Don Mueang
data.description: Flight FD 3114, with 162 passengers and six crew members, was preparing to take off to Hat Yai

data.title: Bangkok’s National Museum holds special nighttime event
data.description: Visitors explored museum’s vast collection of Thai antiquities, art objects, and historical artefacts after dark

data.title: No plan to revert THAI to state-owned enterprise: Finance Ministry
data.description: Ministry dismisses allegations regarding proposal to add two more executives to THAI business rehabilitation plan

data.title: Seacon targets housing for civil servants amid economic slowdown
data.description: Bookings in the first nine months down 9% from last year

data.title: Art Auction Centre exhibition, auction feature rare masterpieces
data.description: Masterpieces up for auction at event titled ‘Driven’ displayed alongside exceptional luxury cars

data.title: Indonesia to transfer remaining ‘Bali Nine’ prisoners to Australia
data.description: JAKARTA - Indonesia has agreed to return to Australia the five remaining members of the so-called Bali Nine  drug smuggling  ring who are currently serving life sentences, an Indonesia minister said on Saturday.

data.title: China-Thailand Railway: A New Era of Connectivity
data.description: With the roar of the whistle, a Harmony train loaded with "Made in Anning" departed from Anning North Port, Kunming International Dry Port, China, delivered the goods to Bangkok, Thailand via the China-Laos-Thailand Railway, and finally arrived at Ranong by road transportation. Meanwhile, another freight train loaded with Thai fruits also departed from Larang, passing through Vientiane, Laos, and finally arriving in Anning, Yunnan Province.

data.title: How a Trump victory could impact your investment portfolio?
data.description: UOB Thailand’s shares insights on what a second-term Trump presidency might mean for investors.

data.title: Architect’25, "Past Present Perfect," to showcase Thai architecture globally
data.description: The Association of Siamese Architects under Royal Patronage (ASA), in collaboration with TTF International Co., Ltd, has officially announced the 37th edition of Architect Expo, the largest building technology exposition in ASEAN.

data.title: Hoping to break its duck
data.description: The drum is rolling once again for the People’s Party (PP), now fired up to win tomorrow’s local election in Udon Thani, a political heartland of the ruling Pheu Thai Party, which it managed to tap into in last year’s general election.

data.title: Council approves big BMA debt fufilment budget
data.description: The Bangkok Metropolitan Council has approved the request by the Bangkok Metropolitan Administration request for a 14.54-billion-baht budget for paying the debt owed to Bangkok Mass Transit System Plc (BTSC), the operator of the BTS Skytrain.

data.title: 30 years of global learning
data.description: In an era when the world is all about cultural  diversity  and endless possibilities, growing up means not only a path toward academic achievement but also embracing a broader perspective of being a  global citizen .

data.title: Singaporean held for making bomb threat against flight
data.description: Authorities have arrested a man holding a Singaporean passport following a  bomb threat  called in against an AirAsia flight departing from Bangkok to Hat Yai.

data.title: Thai court dismisses activist’s spyware suit
data.description: The Bangkok Civil Court has dismissed a lawsuit by activist  Jatupat Boonpattararaksa  against NSO Group Technologies for allegedly failing to prevent him from being targeted with its Pegasus  spyware , according to Amnesty International.

data.title: Arrest warrants issued for Dr Boon, eight others in fraud case
data.description: Arrest warrants have been issued for Dr Boon Vanasin, founder of Thonburi Healthcare Group (THG), and eight others on charges of public fraud and money laundering. While six individuals were arrested, Dr Boon has fled abroad.

data.title: Hoping to break its duck
data.description: The drum is rolling once again for the People’s Party (PP), now fired up to win tomorrow’s local election in Udon Thani, a political heartland of the ruling Pheu Thai Party, which it managed to tap into in last year’s general election.

data.title: Arrest warrant issued for founder of Thonburi Hospital in fraud case
data.description: Dr Boon has reportedly fled to China, whereabouts of co-accused wife and daughter not known yet

data.title: Charter court ruling only a temporary relief for Thaksin and Pheu Thai
data.description: Ex-PM and ruling party face two other cases, which could decide their fate over the next year

data.title: High optimism in Thai youth despite social challenges, study finds
data.description: Employment, quality of education, and housing affordability emerge as major concerns

data.description: Stenergard discusses OECD membership, also checks out Bangkok’s bustling Talad Noi, Chinatown

data.title: AOT to pay King Power THB193m to reacquire rented space at Suvarnabhumi
